dc:title: Child obesity
dc:publisher: Office for Health Improvement and Disparities

source.name: Office for Health Improvement and Disparities

indicators.code: Aged four to five years underweight
indicators.label: Underweight prevalence in children at reception age
indicators.subtitle: Percentage of children aged 4 to 5 classified as underweight
indicators.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage of children aged 4-5 years (reception age) classified as underweight, in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2023/24.

indicators.code: Aged four to five years healthy weight
indicators.label: Healthy weight prevalence in children at reception age
indicators.subtitle: Percentage of children aged 4 to 5 classified as at a healthy weight
indicators.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage of children aged 4-5 years (reception age) classified as healthy weight, in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2023/24.

indicators.code: Aged four to five years overweight
indicators.label: Overweight prevalence in children at reception age
indicators.subtitle: Percentage of children aged 4 to 5 classified as overweight
indicators.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage of children aged 4-5 years (reception age) classified as overweight, in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2023/24.

indicators.code: Aged four to five years obese
indicators.label: Obesity prevalence in children at reception age
indicators.subtitle: Percentage of children aged 4 to 5 classified as living with obesity
indicators.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage of children aged 4-5 years (reception age) classified as living with obesity (including severe obesity), in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2023/24.

indicators.label: Underweight prevalence in children at Year 6 age
indicators.subtitle: Percentage of children aged 10 to 11 classified as underweight
indicators.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage of children aged 10-11 years (Year 6 age) classified as underweight, in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2023/24.

indicators.label: Healthy weight prevalence in children at Year 6 age
indicators.subtitle: Percentage of children aged 10 to 11 classified as at a healthy weight
indicators.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage of children aged 10-11 years (Year 6 age) classified as healthy weight, in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2023/24.

indicators.label: Overweight prevalence in children at Year 6 age
indicators.subtitle: Percentage of children aged 10 to 11 classified as overweight
indicators.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage of children aged 10-11 years (Year 6 age) classified as overweight, in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2023/24.

indicators.label: Obesity prevalence in children at Year 6 age
indicators.subtitle: Percentage of children aged 10 to 11 classified as living with obesity
indicators.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage of children aged 10-11 years (Year 6 age) classified as living with obesity (including severe obesity), in England, for academic years 2006/07 to 2023/24.
